bibl.title: Heliodoros's "Sources": Intertextuality, Paternity, and the Nile River in the Aithiopika. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The connection between the figure of the Nile and the novel's self-conscious manipulation of its literary models.
ELMER David F., Heliodoros's "Sources": Intertextuality, Paternity, and the Nile River in the Aithiopika. Avec résumé en anglais.
